pr_title: CUSTCOM-194 The delete-jvm-options command shouldn't require to specify the Java version prefix

timeline.message: CUSTCOM-194 The delete-jvm-options command shouldn't require to specify the Java version prefix

timeline.bodyText: This construct fails in some cases when multiple options are removed.  Iterator is only initialised once, so you can have the situation that the second toRemoveOption value is already in the part of the iterator which has been traversed already.
timeline.author: rdebusscher

replies.bodyText: @rdebusscher, you are right. It was a dumb mistake on my part
replies.author: MeroRai

timeline.message: Now can delete multiple JVM options
